title: New bug
body: Am currently in a game where my left click has decided to be a be careful ping, which means all I can do on olaf is walk around and press w, smite, all other spells don't work I just ping, also pressing enter to chat is not working so I can not tell my team my issue, had to write this on my phone because I could not alt tab to so so

replies.body: To fix it I restarted laptop
